post.body: haaa I can feel the joy, delight. Wish you & @JagritiYatra great moments.Feeling bit sad to miss :( @cyberdees & I in 2009 :)
Happy Christmas to all of you :)
Introducing "TweetMeet".Now with ur twitter account,u can publish&manage event.Caution:It is Alpha :) http://ayojak.com/event/tweetmeet/home
New Year Welcoming party night http://cli.gs/HzdjgZ
Ayojak TweetMeet is shaping well :) landing online today! Ayojak + Twitter =Publish Micro events( more than 140 char) to your twitter stream
Ayojak is releasing an innovative & simple concept "MicroEvent" publishing today! Twitter users can login & create events & update as tweet
Welcoming New Year Events,now online in Ayojak, http://ayojak.com/event/tickets MusicMasti 2008,Ananda Valley,Tide Blast & Tandav,more soon
http://ayojak.com/ Ayojak 0.9.0 live now- Brings you events and you can buy online tickets! New year Events coming on Monday
Plenty of New Year events coming on in Ayojak, from Monday, you can buy online tickets too, more from Monday .. stay tuned :)
Ayojak groups http://ayojak.com/group/manage/home :) More things coming in Ayojak,pls spread words abt us
Ayojak is about to launch Ticketing solution, now easier for you to to buy online and attend event whenever & wherever you want.
http://twitpic.com/t2fg - Ayojak was the online media event partner for Pune Wine Festival
Ayojak's parent company Signure Technologies http://signure.com is One YEAR baby today! http://twitpic.com/s4oi
Biggest Auto Expo in Pune from 10th Dec, find more detail http://cli.gs/LWDeBT
We released 0.8 of http://ayojak.com. Create Event Group and manage invitaitons. More "Widget-things" :) coming soon
Anybody 4 Pune Wine Tasting Festival :) http://2008.indiawinefestival.com/index.php 5 more FREE tickets with Ayojak.To get, pls tweet back:)
